entry.title: Current Conditions: 16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Wind: S 42 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 7 except 12 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle and fog changing to a few showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7 except 12 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
